column5: English
column11: English

column4:
ここだね。
入ってみよう。
column5:
Here we are.
Let's go in.
column11:
Here we are.
Let's go in.

column5: Welcome to the Bow Workshop.
column11: Welcome to the Bow Workshop.

column4: この人が弓工房の人形師？
column5: Are you the workshop's Puppetmaker?
column11: Are you Puppet Technician at this workshop?

column5: You're so young!
column11: You're young!!

column5: You're quite young yourself.
column11: You're quite young, yourself.

column4:
私は二代目でね。
先代から弓工房を引き継いだ
ばかりなんだ。
column5: I'm the second generation of the craftsmen here. I took this workshop over from my predecessors.
column11: I'm the second generation of craftsmen I took over this workshop from my predecessors.

column4:
人形師は、みんな年寄り
かと思ってたよ。
column5: I thought all the Puppetmakers were old people.
column11: I thought that all the other puppeteers were old people.

column4:
人形が欲しいんだよ。
見せてくれるかい？
column5:
We're after a Puppet.
Could you show us around?
column11:
We're after a mech.
Could you show us round?

column5: Well, uh...
column11: That's...

column4:
せっかく来てもらって
申し訳ないが、売るわけには
いかないんだ。
column5: I'm afraid they're not for sale. Sorry you came all this way.
column11: I'm afraid that they're not for sale, sorry that you came all this way.

column5: What the--?
column11: What the-?

column4:
オートマンの事件のせいで、
注文が急増していてね。
column5: With all this trouble about the Automen, our orders have exploded.
column11: With all this trouble about the Automen, the number of orders we've received have exploded.

column4:
ずっと先まで予約が
埋まっているんだ。
column5: The waiting list is already filled with reservations.
column11: The waiting list is already filled with reservations.

column4:
何しろ、半年に１台しか
作れないからね。
column5: In any case, it takes half a year to make a single machine.
column11: At any rate, it takes half a year to make a single machine.

column4:
それに、
オートマンに対抗できる
マリオネーションギアは貴重だ。
column5: And on top of that, Marionation Gear that can go up against Automen are valuable.
column11: Plus, Marionation Gear that can go up against Automen are valuable.

column4:
できるだけベテランの
人形使いに渡るようにしないと
いけない。
column5: That's why, as much as possible, they're being passed on to people who are already veteran Puppeteers.
column11: That's why, as much as possible, they're being passed on to people who are already veteran puppeteers.

column4:
それなら、なおさら
オレたちに売ったほうがいいぜ。
column5: In that case, all the more reason you should sell one to us.
column11: In that case, all the more reason why you should sell one to us.

column4:
/pの腕は
なかなかのもんだから。
column5: /p here happens to be quite the skilled pilot.
column11: /p here happens to be a considerably skilled pilot.

column4:
ははは。
君たちはまだ子供だろ。
column5:
Ha-ha-ha.
You're both still just children.
column11:
Hahaha.
You're both still just children.

column5: I'm a child too, aren't I?
column11: I'm a child too, aren't I?

column4:
ああ、エリー。
来てたのか？
column5:
Oh, Ellie.
You were here?
column11:
Oh, Ellie.
You were here?

column5: And this is...?
column11: And this kid is?

column4:
/c5巫女川エリー/c3。
我が弓工房の人形使いです。
column5:
/c5Ellie Mikokawa/c3.
She's the Bow Workshop's Puppeteer.
column11:
/c5Ellie Mikokawa/c3.
She's the Bow Workshops puppeteer.

column4: ええっ？　こんな子供が？
column5: Huh? A kid this young?
column11: Ehh? Such a small child?

column4:
フフフ。
時代は変わったんですよ。
column5:
Heh heh heh.
The times have changed, you know.
column11:
Heh heh heh.
How times have changed.

column4:
（さっき、オレたちのこと
　子供だって言ってたくせに）
column5: (Even though he was just accusing US of being too young...)
column11: (Even though he just accused us of being too young.)

column4:
私が子供だから、驚く人も
多いです。
column5: A lot of people are surprised to find out that I'm a child.
column11: A lot of people are surprised when they find out that I'm a child.

column4:
でも、/pさんも
オートマンを何体も撃破してる。
噂は聞いてます。
column5: But /p has also taken down many Automen. I've heard the rumors.
column11: But, /p has also crushed a number of Automen. I've heard the rumours.

column4: バルフォー＿ちょっとした驚き

column5: Huh? He has!?
column11: Huh? He has?!

column4: メリッサ＿しょうがないな

column5: That's right.
column11: That's right.

column5: Why don't we have a match?
column11: Why don't we have a match?

column4:
もし私に勝つ程の腕があるなら、
長弓人形を持つ資格があると
思います。
column5: If you have the skills to beat me, then I'll consider your abilities worthy of our Longbow Puppets.
column11: If you have the skills to beat me, then I'll consider your abilities worthy to pilot one of our Longbow Mechs.

column4:
おいおい、勝手に話を
進めてもらっちゃ困るな。
column5: Slow down a second there! You can't just go off making decisions like that on your own.
column11: Slow down a second there, you can't just go off making decisions like that on your own.

column4:
私が負けるとでも？
それに、私の人形は
弓工房の最新型ですよ。
column5:
Do you think I would lose?
Besides, my Puppet is the Bow Workshop's latest model.
column11:
Do you think I'll lose?
Besides, my mech is the latest model from the Bow Workshop.

column5: Well, I suppose it's fine.
column11: Well, I suppose it's fine.

column4:
/p君が勝てば、
エリーが使っているのと同じ
人形を差し上げましょう。
column5: If /p wins, we'll give you the same model that Ellie's using.
column11: If /p wins, we'll give you the same model that Ellie's using.

column4:
まあ、エリーに勝てるとは
思えませんが。
column5: Not like there's much chance you'll defeat her, after all.
column11: Well, not like there's much chance that you'll defeat her.

column5: Do you accept the challenge?
column11: Do you accept the challenge?

column4:
もちろん、受けるぜ！
なあ/p！
column5:
Of course we do!
Right, /p!?
column11:
Of course we do!
Right, /p!

column5: This must be Aston.
column11: This must be Aston.

column4: さ、急いで弓工房を探そう。
column5: All righty, let's hurry up and find the Bow Workshop.
column11: All righty, let's hurry up and find the Bow Workshop.

column4:
これが長弓人形か……。
すげぇ……
column5:
So that's the Longbow Puppet...?
Impressive...
column11:
So that's a Longbow Mech...?
Impressive...

column4: メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き
あの弓、３０メートルはある。
column5: That bow is 30 meters long.
column11: That bow is thirty metres long.

column4:
クロム鋼のワイヤーで
弓を引く仕掛け……。
column5: There's a mechanism made of chrome wire that draws it.
column11: There's a mechanism made of chrome wire which draws the bow.

column5: Amazing...
column11: Amazing...

column5: Watch out for arrows, /p!
column11: /p, watch out for incoming arrows!

column4:
射撃型のオートマンが
出てくるなんてなぁ。
column5: A gunner Automan's showed up...
column11: A gunner-type Automan appeared.

column4:
このままじゃあ、
/pが苦しくなるなぁ。
column5: If this keeps up, /p's gonna be in hot water.
column11: If this keeps up, /p is going to be in hot water.

column5: We have to help...
column11: We have to help...

column5: But what should we do...?
column11: So then, what should we do...?

column4:
だったら、遠距離攻撃用の
マリオネーションギアを
買えば？
column5: If that's how things are, why not buy a Marionation Gear with a long-range attack?
column11: If that's the case, why not buy a Marionation Gear with a long-range attack?

column5: You say that like it's easy.
column11: You say that like it's easy.

column4: アンマリー＿親しい人と話す
あるじゃん。いい工房が。
column5: It is. From a decent workshop, to boot.
column11: It is. From a decent Workshop.

column4:
/c5弓工房/c3。弓を装備したマリオ
ネーションギアを作る工房よ。
column5: The /c5Bow Workshop/c3. They produce Puppets equipped with bows and arrows.
column11: The /c5Bow Workshop/c3. They produce dolls equipped with bows and arrows.

column4:
弓工房か……。
聞いたことはある。値段は安い
けど、技術水準は高いって。
column5: The Bow Workshop, hm...? I have heard of them. Their prices are cheap, but they hold high standards.
column11:
The Bow Workshop, hm...?
I have heard of them, their prices are cheap but the standards are still high.

column4:
確か場所は/c5アーストン/c3……
そう遠くないよな。
column5: If I'm not mistaken, they're located in /c5Aston/c3...That's not too far.
column11: If I'm not mistaken, they're located in /c5Aston/C3... That's not too far.

column5: All right!
column11: All right!

column4: メリッサ＿ちょっとした驚き
で、アーストンに行きたいの？
column5: So you want to go to Aston?
column11: So, you want to go to Aston?

column5: Yeah! Right now!
column11: Yeah! Right now!

column5: ...That's easier said than done.
column11: …That's easier said than done.

column4: ガロイ親方＿戦闘中真剣

まあ、いい考えでは
あるかもしれんな。
column5: Actually, it might be a good idea.
column11: Well, it might be a good idea.

column4:
確かに、あのオートマンに対抗
するためには、こっちの人形も
多いにこしたことはない。
column5: It's true that if we're going up against Automen, the more Puppets we have, the better.
column11: It's true, in order to go up against the Automen, the more mechs we have, the better.

column5: Well, you're not wrong there...
column11: Well, you're not wrong there.

column4:
だが、いつオートマンが
襲ってこないとも限らん。
column5: But we have no idea when the Automen might attack.
column11: But there's no limit as to when the Automen might attack.

column4:
全員がここを離れるのは
得策とはいえん。
column5: It's not a good idea for everyone to go away and leave the workshop unattended.
column11: It's not a good idea for everyone to leave go and this place unattended.

column4:
だから、お前が
ケイと/pを連れて
アーストンに行ってこい。
column5: So, you should take Kay and /p to Aston.
column11: So, you should take Kay and /p to Aston.

オレとアンマリーがここを守る。
いいな。
column5:
Anne-Marie and I will keep watch here.
All right?
column11:
Anne-Marie and I will keep watch here.
All right?

column5: Got it.
column11: Got it.

column4:
じゃあ行こう。
ケイ、/p、準備しな。
column5:
Let's go, then.
Kay and /p, I hope you're ready.
column11:

Kay, /p, I hope you're ready.

column11: Roger!!

column5: Hee hee.
column11: Hehe.

column4: アンマリー＿腹立ちまぎれに話す

column5: How dumb can they be?
column11: How dumb can they be?

column4:
弓工房の人形が
簡単に買えると思ってるわけ。
column5: Who could think it'd be so easy to just go buy a Puppet from the Bow Workshop?
column11: I can't imagine that it'd be so easy to just buy a mech from the Bow Workshop.

column4: アンマリー＿挑発する等

弓工房は、八工房にこそ
数えられてないけど
名門中の名門よ。
column5: It may not be one of the Eight, but it's still one of the most prestigious workshops.
column11: The Bow Workshop isn't counted as one of the Hachi Workshops, but they're still known amongst the prestigious to be worth noting.

column4:
二代目は若いけど、
腕はいいって評判だし。
評論家の評価も高い。
column5: Its second generation is young, but they're rumored to be exceptionally skilled. The critics love them, too.
column11: The second generation may be young, but they're rumoured to be exceptionally skilled. The critics also rate them highly.

column4: アンマリー＿腹立ちまぎれに話す

すぐに売ってもらえる
わけないじゃない。
column5: There's no way they'd sell them Puppets right off the bat like that.
column11: There's no way they'd sell mechs off the bat like that.

column5: IIIIDIOOOTS!
column11: Iiiidiots!
